concept.title: Default user accounts
concept.shortdesc: IBM StoredIQ comes with a set of default user accounts.

prodinfo.prodname: IBM StoredIQ Deployment and Configuration Guide

conbody.p: For security reasons, change the passwords for these default accounts after the installation is complete so that they are unique and different from the default values. The new password must be 8 to 64 characters long and must contain characters from at least three of these categories:

ul.li: Punctuation marks or special characters: . : = * Ë† / $ # _ + @ & % -
